page.title: 17Leisure in Wolsingham
page.content: Wolsingham no longer has a theatre or a cinema;the{Amateur Dramatic {Society}uses the Comprehensive School hall for its annual productions. Society members come from all parts of Weardale.The{Steelworks Male Voice {Choir}gives many concerts. Many adults find their entertainment in the Pubs and Club;bingo,darts,pool and dominos are all played and there are leagues for both men and women darts players.{Pub Quizs}are also popular. The Show and Carnival committees organise discos and barbecues during the summer.Ceilidhs are popular and a local group,the{Puddin'Poke Buskers are increasingly in demand. The W.I.is active and Age Concern and the Over 60's meet regularly. Other groups,like young Wives and Discussion Group meet monthly.
